reviewText: Covers BMW, Corvette, Camaro, Volt and Ferrari.

These videos are a must see for anyone considering studying manufacturing engineering.  They are very well done.  It was very helpful to view the foundry applications in making engine blocks.  These areas are very difficult to see in person because of the hazards involved with the molten metal during a pour ( liquid Iron 2600 degrees F and liquid aluminium at 1400 degrees F) into a mold.
